QuestData.Title: Blades in the Dark
QuestData.Description: Those orcs got hold of Ishaal's orb, did they? That would explain the dangerous-looking fellow who crossed into this realm shortly before you.$B$BNot everyone handles the transition as... gracefully as you did. The oaf is still grappling with his own mind, stumbling about and muttering nonsense.$B$BSoon he will be drawn to the orb again, which would presumably lead him to Veil Terokk.$B$BBetter to take him out now while he's still befuddled.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Driven mad by crossing into the shadow realm. Still dangerous.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Malrok Thornscar in Veil Akraz.
QuestData.CompletionText: Put the poor fool down before he hurts somebody.
QuestData.RewardText: He was a big boy, wasn't he? The fiends will make quite a feast of him.
